column4: I'm trying to install 5.10.  The installer appears to have a resize tool, but when I choose this options nothing happens.  The manual on the CD doesn't mention it from what I can see.  Does the CD have a resize tool or am I seeing things?
hit enter on the ntfs partition, and it should give you an option to resize it
When I choose the resize option I don't get any options.  Should I select another option to resize?
